description: Temporarily ban a user from the server.

user.name: user
user.description: User you want to temporarily ban.

reason.name: reason
reason.description: Reason for temporarily banning this user.

message-history.name: message-history
message-history.description: Specify if you want to delete the user's message history.

silent.name: silent
silent.description: Specify if you want the sanction not to be notified to the user.
